T04D3932:123b-0: @123b ting nge 'dzin gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam par gzhag pa bzhugs /
T04D3932:123b-2: # // ting nge 'dzin gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam par gzhag pa /
T04D3932:123b-3: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T04D3932:123b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po la bka' stsal pa /
T04D3932:123b-5: gnas pa dang spyad par mi bya ba'i chos rnam pa bcu yod de /
T04D3932:123b-6: gal te rnal 'byor can dag spyod pa ngan pa
T04D3932:123b-7: 'di las 'ga' tsam gyi rjes su zhugs na yang
T04D3932:123b-8: 'dod pa'i khams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba tsam yang
T04D3932:123b-10: ci ste sngar grub na yang de ma thag tu
T04D3932:123b-11: phyir stor cing nyams par gyur na dbugs dang gzugs
T04D3932:123b-14: theg pa gcig gi bar du thob par 'gyur ba lta ci smos /
T04D3932:123b-17: 'jig rten kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom 'dod
T04D3932:123b-18: kyang 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis brel bas 'tsho ba'i
T04D3932:123b-19: rkyen gyis nyon mongs pa dang /
T04D3932:123b-20: kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom 'dod kyang tshul
T04D3932:123b-21: khrims nyams shing kha na ma tho ba mang po
T04D3932:123b-22: byed pa dang / kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin
T04D3932:123b-23: bsgom 'dod kyang phyin ci log tu lta zhing 'jig
T04D3932:123b-24: rten gyi ltas bzang ngan la chags te lus dang
T04D3932:123b-26: kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom 'dod kyang sems
T04D3932:123b-27: g-yo zhing rgod pas 'phags pa la mi gzhol te
T04D3932:123b-29: kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom 'dod kyang phra
T04D3932:123b-30: ma byed pa las dga' bas dbyen byed pa dang
T04D3932:123b-31: / kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom 'dod kyang
T04D3932:123b-32: ngag rtsub pos 'phags pa la smod cing dbang [?]
T04D3932:124a-0: / za ba dang / kha cig ni ting nge @124a * //
T04D3932:124a-1: 'dzin bsgom 'dod kyang tshig 'khyal pa dang brdzun du smra ba dang /
T04D3932:124a-2: kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom 'dod kyang 'dod
T04D3932:124a-3: chags dang phrag dog gis gzhan gyi khe dang bsti
T04D3932:124a-4: stang dang / rnyed pa la mi dga' ba dang /
T04D3932:124a-5: kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom 'dod kyang zhe
T04D3932:124a-6: sdang dang bcas pas sems can la gnod sems bskyed
T04D3932:124a-7: pa dang / kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom
T04D3932:124a-8: 'dod kyang log par lta ba dang bcas pas rgyu
T04D3932:124a-10: tshangs pa chen po de ltar shes par bya ste /
T04D3932:124a-11: 'di dag ni gnas pa dang spyad par mi bya ba'i chos rnam pa bcu zhes bya'o //
T04D3932:124a-12: gal te ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa dag spyod pa
T04D3932:124a-13: ngan pa 'di dag las 'ga' tsam gyi rjes su
T04D3932:124a-14: zhugs na 'dod pa'i khams kyi dge ba yang yongs
T04D3932:124a-16: ci ste sngar grub na yang de ma thag tu
T04D3932:124a-17: stor cing nyams par gyur na gzugs dang gzugs med
T04D3932:124a-20: theg pa gcig thob par 'gyur ba lta ci smos /
T04D3932:124a-21: tshangs pa chen po gzhan yang gnas pa dang /
T04D3932:124a-22: spyad par mi bya ba'i chos bcu yod de /
T04D3932:124a-23: ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa dag spyod pa ngan pa
T04D3932:124a-24: 'di dag las 'ga' zhig dang ldan na ting nge
T04D3932:124a-26: ci ste sngar grub na yang de ma thag tu stor cing nyams par 'gyur ro //
T04D3932:124a-29: las su bya ba'i dngos po la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
T04D3932:124a-30: bre mo'i gtam la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
T04D3932:124a-31: gnyid kyis log pa la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
T04D3932:124a-32: zang zing tshol ba la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
T04D3932:124a-33: gzugs bzang po la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
T04D3932:124a-34: sgra snyan pa la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
T04D3932:124a-35: dri zhim pa la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
T04D3932:124a-36: ro zhim pa la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
T04D3932:124a-37: reg bya 'jam po la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
T04D3932:124a-38: rtog pa dang dpyod pa la dga' zhing chags pa'o //
T04D3932:124a-39: tshangs pa chen po de ltar shes par bya ste /
T04D3932:124a-40: gnas pa dang dpyad par mi bya ba'i chos rnam
T04D3932:124a-41: pa bcu po de ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa dag
T04D3932:124a-42: spyod pa ngan pa 'di las 'ga' zhig dang ldan
T04D3932:124a-43: na yang ting nge 'dzin yongs su mi 'grub bo
T04D3932:124b-0: // ci ste sngar grub na yang de @124b ma thag tu stor cing nyams par 'gyur ro //
T04D3932:124b-1: gal te ting nge 'dzin de ma grub na dge
T04D3932:124b-2: ba'i tshogs ci bsags kyang bde ba'i don du mi
T04D3932:124b-3: 'gyur te / gang dag bdag gi longs spyod dang
T04D3932:124b-4: dad pas sbyin pas ba sgrub pa'i phyir sems dang
T04D3932:124b-5: sems las byung ba'i chos ngan pa skye bar 'gyur
T04D3932:124b-6: 'gyur te / ro // de'i rkyen gyis rgyal po
T04D3932:124b-7: dang blon po chen po'i khrims dang yang 'gal bar
T04D3932:124b-8: 'gyur te / ro // byed de / kha cig la ni gshe zhing spyo ba yang byed de /
T04D3932:124b-9: kha cig la ni lcag gis gzhu ba dang /
T04D3932:124b-10: kha cig la ni lus kyi yan lag dang /
T04D3932:124b-11: nying lag gcod cing srog gcod par yang byed do //
T04D3932:124b-12: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis nad drag pos 'de bas shing yun ring por sdug bsngal myong ba dang /
T04D3932:124b-14: 'chi 'phos nas kyang ngan song gsum gang yang rung ba cig gi nang du skye ba nas /
T04D3932:124b-15: mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i bar du ltung bar 'gyur te /
T04D3932:124b-18: lha min la sogs pa dang 'dra bar bsam gtan las nyams nas /
T04D3932:124b-19: mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i bar du ltung
T04D3932:124b-20: zhing rnam pa tshad med pa snyed kyi sdug bsngal
T04D3932:124b-21: chen po mi bzod pa kun myong bar 'gyur ro
T04D3932:124b-22: // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
T04D3932:124b-23: pa cang shes koondi n+ya la 'di skad ces bka'
T04D3932:124b-24: // stsal to // khyod pas mthar gnas shing ting
T04D3932:124b-25: nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i dge slong dag gnas khang mchog
T04D3932:124b-28: kha zas mchog la spyod cing dge 'dun gyi las thams cad mi byed par gnang ngo //
T04D3932:124b-30: ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa dag gal te 'tsho ba'i
T04D3932:124b-31: yo byad kyis brel bar gyur na sems dang sems
T04D3932:124b-32: las byung ba'i chos ngan pa skye zhing ting nge
T04D3932:124b-33: 'dzin thams cad mi grub pa nas /
T04D3932:124b-34: mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i par du ltung
T04D3932:124b-35: zhing mi zad pa'i sdug bsngal chen po rnam pa
T04D3932:124b-36: tshad med pa snyed myong bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3932:124b-37: ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa dag gal te 'tsho ba'i
T04D3932:124b-38: yo byad dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin ma grub
T04D3932:124b-40: sngar grub pa dag kyang mi nyams so //
T04D3932:124b-41: de'i dbang gis mi dge ba'i chos thams cad mi
T04D3932:124b-42: skye ba nas gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par mi
T04D3932:124b-43: dge ba'i rtog pa dang dpyod pa'i bar du mi
T04D3932:125a-0: skye la / mtho ris kyi lhar @125a * //
T04D3932:125a-1: skyes nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du thob par 'gyur ro //
T04D3932:125a-2: ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa dag gal te ting nge 'dzin ma grub na nam gyi stod dang /
T04D3932:125a-3: nam gyi smad la mi nyal bar bya ste brtson 'grus su bslab cing bsgom pa dang /
T04D3932:125a-4: 'du 'dzi yongs su spangs te 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes par bya ba na /
T04D3932:125a-5: ci la yang mi chags pa dang /
T04D3932:125a-20: bag med pa thams cad yongs su spang ngo //
T04D3932:125a-21: gang de ltar nan tan byed pa de ni brgya byin dang /
T04D3932:125a-24: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la sogs pas bstod pa dang bsngags pa dang /
T04D3932:125a-28: bsnyen bkur la sogs pa dang /
T04D3932:125a-29: sbyin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyang blang bar bya na /
T04D3932:125a-32: rje rigs la sogs pa'i mchod pa len pa lta ci smos /
T04D3932:125a-33: ting nge 'dzin ma thob pa dag kyang de dag gis bstod pa dang /
T04D3932:125a-40: mchod pa bdag gi byed du dbang na ting nge 'dzin thob pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T04D3932:125a-41: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
T04D3932:125a-42: ting 'dzin bsgoms pas the tshom gcod 'gyur te //
T04D3932:125a-43: de ma gtogs pa gzhan gyis nus ma yin //
T04D3932:125a-44: de bas ting 'dzin bsgom pa mchog yin gyi //
T04D3932:125a-45: mkhas pa dag gis de la mchod par bya //
T04D3932:125a-46: shin tu rgyas pa chen po sa'i snying po 'khor
T04D3932:125a-47: lo bcu pa'i mdo las byung ba gnas pa dang
T04D3932:125a-48: spyad par mi bya ba ste /
T04D3932:125a-49: ting nge 'dzin gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam par gzhag pa rdzogs so /
T04D3932:125a-51: // / rgya'i mkhan po ha shang zab mo la sogs pa dang /
T04D3932:125a-52: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande rnam par mi
